q: LifeNews.com obtained, Cecile Richards said she is expecting a vote this week on the Mike Pence measure, which she called`` the most dangerous legislative assault on women's health in Planned Parenthood's 95-year history.'' That's not an exaggeration, it is a simple fact- and if they succeed, the consequences for women will be catastrophic. We need everyone who cares about women's health to join together to oppose this attack on Planned Parenthood and those we serve, she said.`` Anti-choice House leadership wants to completely eliminate this crucial funding- particularly for Planned Parenthood. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. He recalls receiving a book that Henry Kissinger had written, with the inscription,`` To an occasional adversary and a permanent friend.''
